header.rec_loc: A traditional Polish bakery/café in Tarnow, Poland
header.topics: The location (traditional bakery/café), postal service, social media friends, travel plans, water quality, swearing, the ‘facts of life’, underwear.
header.activity: Two friends talking about various topics (see 9 above) in a traditional Polish bakery/café in Tarnow, Poland.

speaker.occupation: unemployed/ Some part-time private TEFL teacher/ Semi-retired
Teacher of English as a foreign Language
